revised_title: On the Periodicities of Sunspots: Analyzing Sunspot Data and Discovering Hidden Periodicities
tldr: The author investigates the periodicities of sunspots using various sunspot data series, including Wolf's sunspot numbers, sunspot areas from photographs, and Greenwich observations. They develop a method to analyze the data using Fourier's theorem and periodograms to discover hidden periodicities, particularly focusing on the 11-year period. This method helps to understand the sun's behavior and improve our knowledge of solar physics.
